channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Broken pavement slabs that are now uneven and sunk, 8th November
item.description:
Broken pavement slabs that are uneven and have sunk causing pedestrians to trip and fall including and elderly lady. Edge of nearby metal cover is now exposed causing additional trip hazard. Pavement is to the right of property number 20 if you are looking at the houses and has been an issue for a few months now.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fairfield Road, Plaistow, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Street bollard been hit again, 8th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Slade Green Road, Slade Green, London

item.title: Dangerous parking and load., 8th November
item.description:
